meanings.definition: Plasmodesms: Small channels in plant cell walls that allow for communication and transport between adjacent cells.
meanings.sent1: The plasmodesms in the plant cell walls help cells talk to each other.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study plasmodesms to understand how cells share information.
meanings.sent3: The plasmodesms in the cell walls must be the plant's secret messaging system!
meanings.sent4: The plasmodesms act like tiny tunnels connecting the plant cells.
meanings.sent5: Visualize plasmodesms as tiny communication bridges between plant cells.
